t: Amazon.com: Homey Pro | Smart Home Hub for Home Automation – Features Z-Wave Plus, Zigbee, Wi-Fi, BLE, Infrared, Matter & Thread. Compatible with Apple Siri, Amazon Alexa & Google Home. : Tools & Home Improvement
s: Best smart home decision of my life. ... I’ve been using the Homey Pro for a few months now, and I have to say—it’s one of the most powerful and versatile smart home hubs I’ve tried. The setup was surprisingly smooth, and I love that it supports so many different protocols (Zigbee, Z-Wave, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and more). Unlike other hubs that lock you into a specific ecosystem, Homey Pro gives you the freedom to mix and match devices from different brands...
